subject: Use global CFLAGS and LDFLAGS
commitMessage:
Use global CFLAGS and LDFLAGS

Change-Id: I4959fd2135c239d10d841f731d2ad48facdb6765
Signed-off-by: Yury Usishchev <y.usishchev@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Verified+1

(1 comment)

From unix/configure file:

# To construct unzip automatically using this file, type

# "make -f unix/Makefile generic".


So now build uses configure(which is patched a bit to use CFLAGS and LDFLAGS)
